document_data.name: ''Wand of Magus''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Wand of magus''''' was an [[enchanted]] [[wand]] from the ruined [[Castle Cormanthor]] of the [[elf|elven]] city [[Myth Drannor]].
document_data.Description: A ''wand of magic'' was an ornate rod that shimmered with magical power.
document_data.Powers: These ornate wands allowed the wielder to summon a beam of ''[[searing light]]''. On average, a ''wand of magus'' held four chargers of the spell at a time. Additionally, these wands' enchantments granted the wielder significant sagacity at the coast of lowered physique constitution. These wands could only be used by [[cleric]]s, [[paladin]]s, and [[ranger]]s.
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1369}}, a ''wand of magus'' could be found locked away in an ancient study of the Silverspear Armory in Castle Cormanthor. Along with the wand, the chest contained the magic ''[[death's head ring]]'', several ''[[healing potion]]''s, and a '''[[potion of bull's strength]]''.
